content.description: Climbs the farthest route left on the wall up a groove with multiple xenoliths (the random darker rocks). A crack to the right of the start would take small pro to get you to the only bolt at the crux. Protection is basically nonexistent above the crux bolt to the anchors, although the climbing is much easier higher up. Two bolt anchor shared with KF.
content.protection: Single bolt at the crux. Crack down low would take small pro. Nothing above the crux bolt, which is about half way up, although the climbing is much easier where run out. Two bolt anchor shared with KF.
content.location: About 20' left of KF, furthest left on the wall. Start just left of a crack which can be used for protection. The area around the wall left of KF is a bit overgrown with typical McDowell's brush.

content.description: Easy slabby route with good height, exposure, and views.
content.protection: 2 bolts, small nuts at upper flake.   Set medium to large and XL gear for TR.
content.location: Climb the slabby arete on the cone, between KF and 3 Dopes on  Rope.   Rap off Kate's Fault anchors

climbs.name: Kate's Fault
climbs.fa: Kate Nisselson, Doug Fletcher, Jan Holdeman ~? (pre 96)

content.description: The direct start straight below the anchors offers a bit more exposure. Heady lead.
content.protection: Two bolts. 2 bolt anchor with quick links at top.
content.location: Approximately center on the the cone, start on the large flake on the ground or do the direct start further left. Climb diagonally left connecting the dots with the two bulges, use thin slabby flakes for the 5.9+ move. Rap or walk off right.
Left of Main Wall Semi-Featureless Granite Slab Face exposed goodness! :)

content.description: South East Facing Granite Feature with Great Face Climbing, scattered bolts and micro bulges. Good beginning leads, run out are possible! Bomber Boulder & or Tree Anchors, Great for a Top Belay! 3526 Peak Elevation for our Little Granite Mountain. Aprox Coordinates: Latitude: 33 degrees, 48, 30; Longitude: 111 degrees, 33, 26
